dnsName.description:
Controls whether `teams-api` is added to the chart's ingress.
When an empty string, a rule for `teams-api` is not added to the chart managed ingress.
When not an empty string, becomes the value to the `host` in the ingress' rule and
set `ingress.api` too. Additionally, the `apiSettings.dnsName` is used by `teams-api`
to generate the `API_EXTERNAL_URL` environment variable for configuring external orchestrators.
dnsName.title: dnsName

env.description: Environment Variables are passed to the `teams-api` containers

FIFTYONE_DO_EXPIRATION_MINUTES.description: (int) The amount of time in minutes that a monitored delegated operation can run without reporting its status before being automatically terminated.
FIFTYONE_DO_EXPIRATION_MINUTES.title: FIFTYONE_DO_EXPIRATION_MINUTES

FIFTYONE_DO_LEGACY_EXPIRATION_MINUTES.description:
(int) The amount of time in minutes that an unmonitored delegated operation can run before being automatically terminated.
Overrides "FIFTYONE_DO_EXPIRATION_DAYS" if provided.
FIFTYONE_DO_LEGACY_EXPIRATION_MINUTES.title: FIFTYONE_DO_LEGACY_EXPIRATION_MINUTES

FIFTYONE_ENV.description:
Controls FiftyOne GraphQL verbosity.
When "production", debug mode is disabled and the default logging level is "INFO".
When "development", debug mode is enabled and the default logging level is "DEBUG".
Can be overridden by setting `apiSettings.env.LOGGING_LEVEL`.
FIFTYONE_ENV.title: FIFTYONE_ENV

FIFTYONE_INTERNAL_SERVICE.description:
TODO: Kevin - remove from values. yaml and hardcode in `_helpers.tpl`
Whether the SDK is running in an internal service context.
When running in FiftyOne Enterprise, set to `true`.
FIFTYONE_INTERNAL_SERVICE.title: FIFTYONE_INTERNAL_SERVICE

FIFTYONE_LOGGING_FORMAT.description:
The format to use for log messages.
Can be one of `json` or `text`.
FIFTYONE_LOGGING_FORMAT.title: FIFTYONE_LOGGING_FORMAT

GRAPHQL_DEFAULT_LIMIT.description:
Default number of returned items when listing in GraphQL queries.
Can be overridden in the request.
GRAPHQL_DEFAULT_LIMIT.title: GRAPHQL_DEFAULT_LIMIT

LOGGING_LEVEL.description:
Logging level. Overrides the value of `FIFTYONE_ENV`.
Can be one of "DEBUG", "INFO", "WARN", "ERROR", or "CRITICAL".
LOGGING_LEVEL.title: LOGGING_LEVEL

env.title: env

pullPolicy.description:
Instruct when the kubelet should pull (download) the specified image.
One of `IfNotPresent`, `Always` or `Never`. [Reference][image-pull-policy].
pullPolicy.title: pullPolicy

tag.description: Image tag for `teams-api`. Defaults to the chart version.
tag.title: tag

enabled.description: Whether to enable init containers for `teams-api`. [Reference][init-containers].
enabled.title: enabled

resources.description: Container resource requests and limits for the `teams-api` `initContainers`. [Reference][resources].
resources.title: resources

labels.description: Additional labels for the `teams-api` related objects. [Reference][labels-and-selectors].
labels.title: labels

failureThreshold.description: Number of times to retry the liveness probe for the `teams-api`. [Reference][probes].
failureThreshold.title: failureThreshold

periodSeconds.description: How often (in seconds) to perform the liveness probe for `teams-api`. [Reference][probes].
periodSeconds.title: periodSeconds

timeoutSeconds.description: Number of seconds after which the liveness probe times out for the `teams-api`. [Reference][probes].
timeoutSeconds.title: timeoutSeconds

podDisruptionBudget.description: Pod Disruption Budget for pods for `teams-api`. [Reference][pod-disruption-budget].

enabled.description: Whether a pod disruption budget is enabled for `teams-api`.
enabled.title: enabled

minAvailable.description:
Sets the minimum available or maximum unavailable replicas for the deployment object.
Either integers or percentages supported.
`maxUnavailable` is also supported, however, only one setting can be used at a time.
If both are set, `minAvailable` will be preferred.
minAvailable.title: minAvailable

podDisruptionBudget.title: podDisruptionBudget

podSecurityContext.description: Pod-level security attributes and common container settings for `teams-api`. [Reference][security-context].
podSecurityContext.title: podSecurityContext

rbac.description:
RBAC roles, bindings, and service accounts which will be used to
submit on-demand delegated operators to the kubernetes API.
If `apiSettings.rbac.create=true`, these will be used by the `teams-api` pods.

create.description:
Controls whether to create the `Role`, `RoleBinding`,
and `ServiceAccount` for on-demand delegated-operator submission.
create.title: create

name.description:
Name of the `Role` (existing or to be created) in the namespace `namespace.name` used for DO management.
Defaults to `release-name-fiftyone-teams-app-do-management`.
name.title: name

create.description:
Controls whether to create the `RoleBinding` named
`apiSettings.rbac.roleBinding.name`.
create.title: create

name.description:
Name of the `RoleBinding` (existing or to be created) in the namespace `namespace.name` used for DO management.
Defaults to `release-name-fiftyone-teams-app-do-management`.
name.title: name

create.description:
Controls whether to create the `ServiceAccount` named
`apiSettings.rbac.serviceAccount.name`.
create.title: create

name.description:
Name of the `ServiceAccount` (existing or to be created) in the namespace `namespace.name` used for DO management.
Defaults to `release-name-fiftyone-teams-app-teams-api`.
name.title: name

rbac.title: rbac

failureThreshold.description: Number of times to retry the readiness probe for the `teams-api`. [Reference][probes].
failureThreshold.title: failureThreshold

periodSeconds.description: How often (in seconds) to perform the readiness probe for `teams-api`. [Reference][probes].
periodSeconds.title: periodSeconds

timeoutSeconds.description: Number of seconds after which the readiness probe times out for the `teams-api`. [Reference][probes].
timeoutSeconds.title: timeoutSeconds

replicaCount.description:
Number of pods in the `teams-api` deployment's ReplicaSet.
When > 1, you must also configure volumes, volumeMounts and set
`apiSettings.env.FIFTYONE_SHARED_ROOT_DIR`.
For more information see [the documentation][configure-ha-teams-api].
replicaCount.title: replicaCount

resources.description:
Instead of setting default resources, we require the user define them
This enables running on resource constrained environments
(like Minikube). To set resources, uncomment the following
lines, adjust them as necessary, and remove the curly braces (`{}`) after 'resources:'.
Container resource requests and limits for `teams-api`. [Reference][resources].
resources.title: resources

secretEnv.description: Secret variables to be passed to the `teams-api` containers.
secretEnv.title: secretEnv

securityContext.description:
TODO: Kevin/topher - Consider renaming `securityContext` to `containerSecurityContext`
Container security configuration for `teams-api`. [Reference][container-security-context].
securityContext.title: securityContext

nodePort.description: (int) Service nodePort set only when `apiSettings.service.type: NodePort` for `teams-api`.
nodePort.title: nodePort

shortname.description:
TODO: Kevin/topher - Consider changing name from `shortname` to `portName`.
TODO: Alex - Default should include protocol in the name per kubernetes standards.
Port name (maximum length is 15 characters) for `teams-api`. [Reference][ports].
shortname.title: shortname

failureThreshold.description: Number of times to retry the startup probe for the `teams-api`. [Reference][probes].
failureThreshold.title: failureThreshold

periodSeconds.description: How often (in seconds) to perform the startup probe for `teams-api`. [Reference][probes].
periodSeconds.title: periodSeconds

timeoutSeconds.description: Number of seconds after which the startup probe times out for the `teams-api`. [Reference][probes].
timeoutSeconds.title: timeoutSeconds

tolerations.description: Allow the k8s scheduler to schedule pods with matching taints for `teams-api`. [Reference][taints-and-tolerations].
tolerations.title: tolerations

topologySpreadConstraints.description:
Control how pods are spread across your distributed footprint.
Label selectors will be defaulted to those of the `teams-api` deployment. [Reference][topology-spread-constraints].
topologySpreadConstraints.title: topologySpreadConstraints

updateStrategy.description: Control how `teams-api` pods are redeployed during an upgrade. [Reference][upgrade-strategies]
updateStrategy.title: updateStrategy

maxReplicas.description: Maximum replicas for horizontal pod autoscaling for `fiftyone-app`.
maxReplicas.title: maxReplicas

minReplicas.description: Minimum Replicas for horizontal pod autoscaling for `fiftyone-app`.
minReplicas.title: minReplicas

targetCPUUtilizationPercentage.description: Percent CPU utilization for autoscaling for `fiftyone-app`.
targetCPUUtilizationPercentage.title: targetCPUUtilizationPercentage

targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage.description: Percent memory utilization for autoscaling for `fiftyone-app`.
targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage.title: targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage

env.description: Environment Variables are passed to the `fiftyone-app` containers

FIFTYONE_APP_DEFAULT_QUERY_PERFORMANCE.description:
Controls whether Query Performance mode is enabled by default for
every dataset for the teams application. Set to false to set default mode to off.
FIFTYONE_APP_DEFAULT_QUERY_PERFORMANCE.title: FIFTYONE_APP_DEFAULT_QUERY_PERFORMANCE

FIFTYONE_APP_ENABLE_QUERY_PERFORMANCE.description:
Controls whether Query Performance mode is enabled for the
application. Set to false to disable Query Performance mode for entire application.
FIFTYONE_APP_ENABLE_QUERY_PERFORMANCE.title: FIFTYONE_APP_ENABLE_QUERY_PERFORMANCE

FIFTYONE_DATABASE_ADMIN.description:
Controls whether the client is allowed to trigger database migrations.
[Reference][fiftyone-config].
FIFTYONE_DATABASE_ADMIN.title: FIFTYONE_DATABASE_ADMIN

FIFTYONE_INTERNAL_SERVICE.description:
TODO: Kevin - remove from values. yaml and hardcode in `_helpers.tpl`
Whether the SDK is running in an internal service context.
When running in FiftyOne Enterprise, set to `true`.
FIFTYONE_INTERNAL_SERVICE.title: FIFTYONE_INTERNAL_SERVICE

FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_APP_IMAGES.description:
Controls whether cloud media images will be downloaded and added to
the local cache upon viewing media in the app.
FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_APP_IMAGES.title: FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_APP_IMAGES

FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_SIZE_BYTES.description:
Set the media cache size (in bytes) for the local FiftyOne App processes.
When not set, the app's default value is 32 GiB.
`-1` disables the media cache garbage collection (and cache size is unlimited).
FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_SIZE_BYTES.title: FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_SIZE_BYTES

FIFTYONE_SIGNED_URL_EXPIRATION.description: Set the time-to-live for signed URLs generated by the application in hours
FIFTYONE_SIGNED_URL_EXPIRATION.title: FIFTYONE_SIGNED_URL_EXPIRATION

env.description: Environment Variables are passed to the `teams-cas` containers

CAS_DATABASE_NAME.description:
Provide the name for the CAS database.
When multiple deployments use the same database instance,
set `CAS_DATABASE_NAME` to a unique value for each deployment.
CAS_DATABASE_NAME.title: CAS_DATABASE_NAME

CAS_DEFAULT_USER_ROLE.description:
Set the default user role for new users
One of `GUEST`, `COLLABORATOR`, `MEMBER`, `ADMIN`
CAS_DEFAULT_USER_ROLE.title: CAS_DEFAULT_USER_ROLE

CAS_MONGODB_URI_KEY.description:
The key from `secret.fiftyone.name` that contains the CAS MongoDB
Connection String.
CAS_MONGODB_URI_KEY.title: CAS_MONGODB_URI_KEY

DEBUG.description:
Set the log level for CAS
examples:
`DEBUG: cas:*` - shows all CAS logs
`DEBUG: cas:*:info` - shows all CAS INFO logs
`DEBUG: cas:*,-cas:*:debug` - shows all CAS logs except DEBUG logs
DEBUG.title: DEBUG

FIFTYONE_AUTH_MODE.description:
Configure Authentication Mode.
One of `legacy` or `internal`
FIFTYONE_AUTH_MODE.title: FIFTYONE_AUTH_MODE

delegatedOperatorDeployments.description: FiftyOne Enterprise Delegated Operator Executor (teams-do) configurations.

deployments.description:
Additional deployments to configure. Each template
will use .Values.delegatedOperatorDeployments.template as a base.
Each template value may be overridden.
Maps/dictionaries will be merged key-wise, with the deployment instance
taking precedence.
List values will not be merged, but be overridden completely by the
deployment instance.

teamsDoCpuDefault.description:
Default (CPU-only) delegated operator runner.
Defaults to an 4vCPU, 16Gi RAM runner.
The deployment is backed with a 2.5Gi in-memory
volume for caching media and an extra 2Gi of shared memory.
teamsDoCpuDefault.title: teamsDoCpuDefault

deployments.title: deployments

template.description:
A common template applied to all deployments. Each deployment can
then override individual fields as needed by the operator.

description.description:
A description for the delegated operator instance. This is unused
in the template context. Each operator should either set their own
description or, optionally, use the default. If unset at the
operator context, it will be defaulted to
`Long running operations delegated to $name` where `$name` is the name
of the Deployment object.
description.title: description

env.description: Environment Variables are passed to the delegated-operator-executor containers.

FIFTYONE_DELEGATED_OPERATION_LOG_PATH.description:
Full path to a network-mounted file system or a cloud storage path to
use for storing logs generated by delegated operation runs, one file
per job. The default `""` means log upload is disabled.
FIFTYONE_DELEGATED_OPERATION_LOG_PATH.title: FIFTYONE_DELEGATED_OPERATION_LOG_PATH

FIFTYONE_INTERNAL_SERVICE.description:
TODO: Kevin - remove from values. yaml and hardcode in `_helpers.tpl`
Whether the SDK is running in an internal service context.
When running in FiftyOne Enterprise, set to `true`.
FIFTYONE_INTERNAL_SERVICE.title: FIFTYONE_INTERNAL_SERVICE

FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_SIZE_BYTES.description:
Set the media cache size (in bytes) for the local FiftyOne Delegated
Operator Executor processes.
When not set, the app's default value is 32 GiB.
`-1` disables the media cache garbage collection (and cache size is unlimited).
FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_SIZE_BYTES.title: FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_SIZE_BYTES

delegatedOperatorDeployments.title: delegatedOperatorDeployments

create.description: Controls whether to create the `ConfigMap` named `delegatedOperatorJobTemplates.configMap.name`.
create.title: create

name.description:
Name of the `ConfigMap` (existing or to be created) in the namespace `namespace.name` used for DO templates.
Defaults to `release-name-fiftyone-teams-app-do-templates`.
name.title: name

template.description:
A common template applied to all deployments. Each deployment can
then override individual fields as needed by the operator.

activeDeadlineSeconds.description: (optional) Maximum of seconds a job should be able to run. [Reference][job-termination-and-cleanup].
activeDeadlineSeconds.title: activeDeadlineSeconds

backoffLimit.description: (optional) Amount of retries for the job to try before being marked as "Failed". [Reference][job-backoff-failure-policy].
backoffLimit.title: backoffLimit

completions.description: (optional) Number of completions to run before marking the job as "Completed". [Reference][job-termination-and-cleanup].
completions.title: completions

containerSecurityContext.description: Container security configuration for generated delegated-operator containers. [Reference][container-security-context].
containerSecurityContext.title: containerSecurityContext

env.description: Environment Variables are passed to the delegated-operator-executor containers.

FIFTYONE_DELEGATED_OPERATION_LOG_PATH.description:
Full path to a network-mounted file system or a cloud storage path to
use for storing logs generated by delegated operation runs, one file
per job. The default `""` means log upload is disabled.
FIFTYONE_DELEGATED_OPERATION_LOG_PATH.title: FIFTYONE_DELEGATED_OPERATION_LOG_PATH

FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_SIZE_BYTES.description:
Set the media cache size (in bytes) for the local FiftyOne Delegated
Operator Executor processes.
When not set, the app's default value is 32 GiB.
`-1` disables the media cache garbage collection (and cache size is unlimited).
FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_SIZE_BYTES.title: FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_SIZE_BYTES

env.title: env

pullPolicy.description:
Instruct when the kubelet should pull (download) the specified image.
One of `IfNotPresent`, `Always` or `Never`. [Reference][image-pull-policy].
pullPolicy.title: pullPolicy

tag.description: Image tag for `delegated-operator-executor`. Defaults to the chart version.
tag.title: tag

labels.description: Additional labels for the `delegated-operator-executor` related objects. [Reference][labels-and-selectors].
labels.title: labels

podSecurityContext.description: Pod-level security attributes and common container settings for `delegated-operator-executor`. [Reference][security-context].
podSecurityContext.title: podSecurityContext

resources.description:
Instead of setting default resources, we require the user define them
This enables running on resource constrained environments
(like Minikube). To set resources, uncomment the following
lines, adjust them as necessary, and remove the curly braces (`{}`) after 'resources:'.
Container resource requests and limits for `delegated-operator-executor`. [Reference][resources].
resources.title: resources

secretEnv.description: Secret variables to be passed to the delegated-operator-executor containers.
secretEnv.title: secretEnv

tolerations.description:
ENV_VAR_NAME:
    secretName: the-pre-existing-secret
    secretKey: the-key-in-the-secret
Allow the k8s scheduler to schedule delegated-operator-executor pods with matching taints. [Reference][taints-and-tolerations].
tolerations.title: tolerations

ttlSecondsAfterFinished.description: (optional) Number of seconds for a job to sit idle before being automatically removed. [Reference][job-termination-and-cleanup].
ttlSecondsAfterFinished.title: ttlSecondsAfterFinished

template.title: template

fiftyoneLicenseSecrets.description: List of secrets for FiftyOne Enterprise Licenses (one per org)
fiftyoneLicenseSecrets.title: fiftyoneLicenseSecrets

global.description: Global values are values that can be accessed from any chart or subchart by exactly the same name.
global.title: global

api.description:
The ingress rule values for teams-api, when `apiSettings.dnsName` is not empty.
[Reference][ingress-rules].
api.title: api

className.description:
Name of the ingress class.  When empty, a default Ingress class should be defined.
When not empty, this value will be the Ingress class name.
[Reference][ingress-default-ingress-class]
className.title: className

enabled.description:
Controls whether to create the ingress. When `false`, uses a pre-existing ingress.
[Reference][ingress].
enabled.title: enabled

paths.description:
Additional ingress rules for the host `teamsAppSettings.dnsName` for
the chart managed ingress (when `ingress.enabled: true`).
[Reference][ingress-rules].
paths.title: paths

tlsEnabled.description: Controls whether the chart managed ingress contains a `spec.tls` stanza.
tlsEnabled.title: tlsEnabled

tlsSecretName.description:
Name of secret containing TLS certificate for `teams-app`.
Certificate should contain the host names `apiSettings.dnsName` and `teamsAppSettings.dnsName`.
When `ingress.tlsEnabled=True`, sets's the value of ingress' `spec.tls[0].secretName`.
tlsSecretName.title: tlsSecretName

create.description:
Controls whether to create the namespace.
When `false`, the namespace must already exists.
create.title: create

name.description: The namespace name used for chart resources.
name.title: name

maxReplicas.description: Maximum replicas for horizontal pod autoscaling for `teams-plugins`.
maxReplicas.title: maxReplicas

minReplicas.description: Minimum Replicas for horizontal pod autoscaling for `teams-plugins`.
minReplicas.title: minReplicas

targetCPUUtilizationPercentage.description: Percent CPU utilization for autoscaling for `teams-plugins`.
targetCPUUtilizationPercentage.title: targetCPUUtilizationPercentage

targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage.description: Percent memory utilization for autoscaling for `teams-plugins`.
targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage.title: targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage

enabled.description: Controls whether to create a dedicated `teams-plugins` deployment.
enabled.title: enabled

env.description: Environment Variables are passed to the `teams-plugins` containers.

FIFTYONE_INTERNAL_SERVICE.description:
TODO: Kevin - remove from values. yaml and hardcode in `_helpers.tpl`
Whether the SDK is running in an internal service context.
When running in FiftyOne Enterprise, set to `true`.
FIFTYONE_INTERNAL_SERVICE.title: FIFTYONE_INTERNAL_SERVICE

FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_APP_IMAGES.description:
Controls whether cloud media images will be downloaded and added to
the local cache upon viewing media in the app.
FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_APP_IMAGES.title: FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_APP_IMAGES

FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_SIZE_BYTES.description:
Set the media cache size (in bytes) for the local FiftyOne Plugins processes.
When not set, the app's default value is 32 GiB.
`-1` disables the media cache garbage collection (and cache size is unlimited).
FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_SIZE_BYTES.title: FIFTYONE_MEDIA_CACHE_SIZE_BYTES

env.title: env

pullPolicy.description:
Instruct when the kubelet should pull (download) the specified image.
One of `IfNotPresent`, `Always` or `Never`. [Reference][image-pull-policy].
pullPolicy.title: pullPolicy

tag.description: Image tag for `teams-plugins`. Defaults to the chart version.
tag.title: tag

enabled.description: Whether to enable init containers for `teams-plugins`. [Reference][init-containers].
enabled.title: enabled

resources.description: Container resource requests and limits for the `teams-plugins` `initContainers`. [Reference][resources].
resources.title: resources

labels.description: Additional labels for the `teams-plugins` related objects. [Reference][labels-and-selectors].
labels.title: labels

failureThreshold.description: Number of times to retry the liveness probe for the `teams-plugins`. [Reference][probes].
failureThreshold.title: failureThreshold

periodSeconds.description: How often (in seconds) to perform the liveness probe for `teams-plugins`. [Reference][probes].
periodSeconds.title: periodSeconds

timeoutSeconds.description: Timeout for the liveness probe for the `teams-plugins`. [Reference][probes].
timeoutSeconds.title: timeoutSeconds

podDisruptionBudget.description: Pod Disruption Budget for pods for `teams-plugins`. [Reference][pod-disruption-budget].

enabled.description: Whether a pod disruption budget is enabled for `teams-plugins`.
enabled.title: enabled

minAvailable.description:
Sets the minimum available or maximum unavailable replicas for the deployment object.
Either integers or percentages supported.
`maxUnavailable` is also supported, however, only one setting can be used at a time.
If both are set, `minAvailable` will be preferred.
minAvailable.title: minAvailable

podDisruptionBudget.title: podDisruptionBudget

podSecurityContext.description: Pod-level security attributes and common container settings for `teams-plugins`. [Reference][security-context].
podSecurityContext.title: podSecurityContext

failureThreshold.description: Number of times to retry the readiness probe for the `teams-plugins`. [Reference][probes].
failureThreshold.title: failureThreshold

periodSeconds.description: How often (in seconds) to perform the readiness probe for `teams-plugins`. [Reference][probes].
periodSeconds.title: periodSeconds

timeoutSeconds.description: Timeout for the readiness probe for the `teams-plugins`. [Reference][probes].
timeoutSeconds.title: timeoutSeconds

replicaCount.description:
Number of pods in the `teams-plugins` deployment's ReplicaSet.
Ignored when `pluginsSettings.autoscaling.enabled: true`. [Reference][deployment].
replicaCount.title: replicaCount

resources.description:
Instead of setting default resources, we require the user define them
This enables running on resource constrained environments
(like Minikube). To set resources, uncomment the following
lines, adjust them as necessary, and remove the curly braces (`{}`) after 'resources:'.
Container resource requests and limits for `teams-plugins`. [Reference][resources].
resources.title: resources

secretEnv.description: Secret variables to be passed to the `teams-plugins` containers.
secretEnv.title: secretEnv

securityContext.description:
TODO: Kevin/topher - Consider renaming `securityContext` to `containerSecurityContext`
Container security configuration for `teams-plugins`. [Reference][container-security-context].
securityContext.title: securityContext

nodePort.description: (int) Service nodePort set only when `pluginsSettings.service.type: NodePort` for `teams-plugins`.
nodePort.title: nodePort

shortname.description:
TODO: Kevin/topher - Consider changing name from `shortname` to `portName`.
TODO: Alex - Default should include protocol in the name per kubernetes standards.
Port name (maximum length is 15 characters) for `teams-plugins`. [Reference][ports].
shortname.title: shortname

failureThreshold.description: Number of times to retry the startup probe for the `teams-plugins`. [Reference][probes].
failureThreshold.title: failureThreshold

periodSeconds.description: How often (in seconds) to perform the startup probe for `teams-plugins`. [Reference][probes].
periodSeconds.title: periodSeconds

timeoutSeconds.description: Timeout for the startup probe for the `teams-plugins`. [Reference][probes].
timeoutSeconds.title: timeoutSeconds

tolerations.description: Allow the k8s scheduler to schedule `teams-plugins` pods with matching taints. [Reference][taints-and-tolerations].
tolerations.title: tolerations

topologySpreadConstraints.description:
Control how Pods are spread across your distributed footprint.
Label selectors will be defaulted to those of the `teams-plugins` deployment. [Reference][topology-spread-constraints].
topologySpreadConstraints.title: topologySpreadConstraints

updateStrategy.description: Control how `teams-plugins` pods are redeployed during an upgrade. [Reference][upgrade-strategies]
updateStrategy.title: updateStrategy

create.description: Controls whether to create the secret named `secret.name`.
create.title: create

cookieSecret.description:
A randomly generated string for cookie encryption.
To generate, run `openssl rand -hex 32`.
cookieSecret.title: cookieSecret

fiftyoneAuthSecret.description:
A randomly generated string for CAS Authentication.
This can be any string you care to use generated by any mechanism you
  prefer.
This is used for inter-service authentication and for the SuperUser to
 authenticate at the CAS UI to configure the Central Authentication Service.
fiftyoneAuthSecret.title: fiftyoneAuthSecret

fiftyoneDatabaseName.description: MongoDB Database Name for FiftyOne Enterprise.
fiftyoneDatabaseName.title: fiftyoneDatabaseName

labels.description: Additional labels for the generated secret. [Reference][labels-and-selectors].
labels.title: labels

name.description: Name of the secret (existing or to be created) in the namespace `namespace.name`.
name.title: name

create.description: Controls whether to create the service account named `serviceAccount.name`.
create.title: create

labels.description: Additional labels for the generated service account. [Reference][labels-and-selectors].
labels.title: labels

name.description:
Name of the service account (existing or to be created) in the namespace `namespace.name` used for deployments.
[Reference][service-account].
name.title: name

maxReplicas.description: Maximum Replicas for horizontal autoscaling for `teams-app`.
maxReplicas.title: maxReplicas

minReplicas.description: Minimum Replicas for horizontal autoscaling for `teams-app`.
minReplicas.title: minReplicas

targetCPUUtilizationPercentage.description: Percent CPU utilization for autoscaling for `teams-app`.
targetCPUUtilizationPercentage.title: targetCPUUtilizationPercentage

targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage.description: Percent memory utilization for autoscaling for `teams-app`.
targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage.title: targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage

dnsName.description:
DNS Name for the `teams-app` service.
Used in the chart managed ingress (`spec.tls.hosts` and `spec.rules[0].host`)
dnsName.title: dnsName

env.description: Environment Variables are passed to the `teams-app` containers.

APP_USE_HTTPS.description:
Controls the protocol of the `teams-app`.  Configure your ingress to match.
When `true`, uses the https protocol.
When `false`, uses the http protocol.
APP_USE_HTTPS.title: APP_USE_HTTPS

FIFTYONE_APP_ANONYMOUS_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.description:
Controls whether anonymous analytics are captured for the
application. Set to false to opt-out of anonymous analytics.
FIFTYONE_APP_ANONYMOUS_ANALYTICS_ENABLED.title: FIFTYONE_APP_ANONYMOUS_ANALYTICS_ENABLED

FIFTYONE_APP_TEAMS_SDK_RECOMMENDED_VERSI.description:
The recommended fiftyone SDK version that will be displayed in the
install modal (i.e. `pip install ... fiftyone==0.11.0`).
FIFTYONE_APP_TEAMS_SDK_RECOMMENDED_VERSI.title: FIFTYONE_APP_TEAMS_SDK_RECOMMENDED_VERSION

FIFTYONE_APP_THEME.description:
The default theme configuration.
`dark`: Theme will be dark when user visits for the first time.
`light`: Theme will be light theme when user visits for the first time.
`always-dark`: Sets dark theme on each refresh (overrides user theme changes in the app).
`always-light`: Sets light theme on each refresh (overrides user theme changes in the app).
FIFTYONE_APP_THEME.title: FIFTYONE_APP_THEME

RECOIL_DUPLICATE_ATOM_KEY_CHECKING_ENABL.description:
Disable duplicate atom/selector key checking that generated false-positive errors.
[Reference][recoil-env].
RECOIL_DUPLICATE_ATOM_KEY_CHECKING_ENABL.title: RECOIL_DUPLICATE_ATOM_KEY_CHECKING_ENABLED

env.title: env

fiftyoneApiOverride.description:
Overrides the `FIFTYONE_API_URI` environment variable. When set
`FIFTYONE_API_URI` controls the value shown in the API Key Modal providing guidance
for connecting to the FiftyOne Enterprise API.
`FIFTYONE_API_URI` uses the value from apiSettings.dnsName if it is set, or
uses the teamsAppSettings.dnsName
fiftyoneApiOverride.title: fiftyoneApiOverride
